## Interagir avec l'API Label Studio

```{python}
#| label: create project
#| echo: true
#| fig-cap: "Connect to Label Studio"

from label_studio_sdk.client import LabelStudio

# Define the URL where Label Studio is accessible and the API key for your user account
LABEL_STUDIO_URL = 'http://user-nrandriamanana-label-studio.user.lab.sspcloud.fr'
# API key is available at the Account & Settings > Access Tokens page in Label Studio UI
API_KEY = 'b4bc0f0b1c33765fce97e0c3571526140c895e61'

# Connect to the Label Studio API and check the connection
ls = LabelStudio(base_url=LABEL_STUDIO_URL, api_key=API_KEY)

```

## Créer une tâche

```{python}
#| label: create-task
#| echo: true
#| fig-cap: "Create a task"

ls.tasks.create(
project=11,
data=task
)

```
